tool_description: This API contains the fuel rate of every city in India. The fuel price of a particular city can also be viewed.
name: INDIAN FUEL
title: INDIAN FUEL

api_list.name: Data of all cities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-fuel.p.rapidapi.com/fuel/data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-fuel.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: City wise data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-fuel.p.rapidapi.com/fuel/data/Chennai"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-fuel.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-fuel.p.rapidapi.com/fuel/data/{city}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-fuel.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
